text: Fascination Records is a Polydor sub-label that launched in spring 2006. The record label is managed by former TOTP Magazine editor Peter Loraine. As part of Polydor Records UK, the label will concentrate on a small number of pop acts and will complement the re-activated Fiction rock imprint. ==Main artists== *Girls Aloud *Sophie Ellis-Bextor *Tokio Hotel *Paul Steel *Connie Fisher *Lee Mead *Popjustice ==Related pages== * List of record labels ==Other websites== * Official site * New artist search * UK Top Connie Fisher * Pop Justice Category:British record labels Category:2006 establishments in the United Kingdom
title: Fascination Records
